headline.main: NYE SEES 'SMEAR' AGAINST WAR FOES; Anti-Semitism Charge Is False, He Says at America First Rally in Brooklyn 500 POLICE GUARD HALL Senator Assails Willkie as 'Me Too Man' and Denounces Roosevelt Foreign Policy

lead_paragraph: United States Senator Gerald P. Nye, addressing an America First rally in the Brooklyn Academy of Music with 500 policemen on guard against disorder, charged last night that he and other non-interventionists were being "smeared" with the issue of anti-Semitism.
